name: MagicVigilante
description:
-Magic Vigilante (魔導自警隊)
This is a difficult bullet-hell shooter.
Press the X key to slow down and hold it down to turn the bullets around you into swords.
The bullets around you will turn into swords.
Release the X key to fire. If you hit an enemy, you will get a score item.
There are 7+1 levels. Half of them are boss battles. Good luck!

The text may be strange because of deepl translation.
The game is in Japanese. But it shouldn't be a problem to play.
("kaibunsyo" is an extra page in Japanese. There is no information on the strategy.)

■Controls
Direction key:Move
Z key: slow move & shot
X key: Slow & Magical Sword
C key: fast move & shot

(You can return to the menu by holding down the R key, but be careful, it is a debugging function.)

■Specifications and advice
It is quite difficult.
LIFE(heart) can be set before start and at game over. (Default value is 4)
Please use it because it recovers to this value when you clear the stage.
When you continue, the values will return to the start of the stage.
You can also select a stage from the menu. Please use it according to your needs.

When the gauge in the lower left corner of the screen is at 30% or more,
holding down the X key will slow down the stage,
and if you continue to hold down the X key The bullets around you will turn into magical swords.
Release the X key to fire. Aiming will change depending on whether you are fighting a boss or not.
Magical Swords give you points when they hit bullets or enemies.
One item is worth three (in the shape of a big diamond) except for boss battles.
LIFE is increased by the total number of items you score.
1st:1250 Every:2500

There is a hidden boss, but there are no conditions for its appearance.
If you clear stage3-2, do not go to stage4, but press the direction key.
You can enter by pressing the direction key.
You can also select it by stageselect.

---win ver only
Gamepad (xinput) can be used with Direction key: Cross button
Z key:A X key:X,B,LT C key:RB,RT corresponds to each.
